document_data.name: ''Starborn''
document_data.mainbody: '''Starborn''' was a [[ship]] that once belonged to [[Lora Bergauz]] of [[Baldur's Gate]]. It was a Valour-class [[Wikipedia:Gaff rig|gaff-rigged]] three-mast, five-gun, [[Wikipedia:Sixth-rate|sixth-rate]] sailing vessel.
document_data.History: Lora Bergauz retired to the city of Baldur's Gate with her daughter after selling her ship, the ''Starborn''. Despite its damaged condition, with two of the five guns broken and the starboard side requiring moderate repair, Lora received a bid of 10,000 [[gold]] [[coin|pieces]] from an anonymous buyer.
